name: HaleOS
body:
### Welcome to HaleOS!
Here you observe a simple x64 bit operating system in the making. Straight from Mann Co. This OS is as bare as Saxton Hale's own zoo. He'll endanger all of those software bloat like he's endangered hundreds of other animals! 


### Building HaleOS
Building HOS is pretty straight forward:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/Jyang772/HaleOS.git
$ make
```


### Authors and Contributors
You can contact me at: justin@micropenguin.net

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Hale? Check out the documentation provided in the Docs folder. 

Be sure to check out our [Forum](forums.micropenguin.net)
